attributes.action: Stop the arising closures to some departments at St Richards Hospital in Chichester West Sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For some time now there has been speculation that certain departments at St Richards are facing closure this includes the A&E Department and also the Women and childrens department.
If this goes ahead our nearest hospitals would be Portsmouth OR Brighton many many miles away. The residents of Chichester and all surrounding area's deserve to have a hospital within distance to them.
St Richards is a fantastic hospital and any closures would be a huge disappointment to all concerned

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
